Identifier is the value of the "nodeId" field, which every document node has, extended with the prefix "id".

DocumentEntryList.description: Represents a list of documents which will be appended to the original resource document.

DocumentEntries.description: Gets or sets list of documents.

DocumentEntry.description: Represents a document which will be appended to the original resource document.

Href.description: Gets or sets path to document to append at the server.

ImportFormatMode.description: Gets or sets defines which formatting will be used: appended or destination document.Can be KeepSourceFormatting or UseDestinationStyles.

DocumentResponse.description: Represents the response with document description.

Links.description: Gets or sets a list of links that originate from this document.

FileName.description: Gets or sets the name of the file.

SourceFormat.description: Gets or sets the original format of the document.

IsEncrypted.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether returns true if the document is encrypted and requires a password to open.

IsSigned.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether returns true if the document contains a digital signature. This property merely informs that a
digital signature is present on a document, but it does not specify whether the signature is valid or not.

DocumentProperties.description: Gets or sets returns document properties.

Link.description:
Provides information for the object link.
This is supposed to be an atom:link, therefore it should have all attributes specified here http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4287#section-4.2.7.

Href.description:
Gets or sets the "href" attribute contains the link's IRI. atom:link elements MUST
have an href attribute, whose value MUST be a IRI reference.

Rel.description:
Gets or sets atom:link elements MAY have a "rel" attribute that indicates the link
relation type.  If the "rel" attribute is not present, the link
element MUST be interpreted as if the link relation type is "alternate".

Type.description:
Gets or sets on the link element, the "type" attribute's value is an advisory
media type: it is a hint about the type of the representation that is
expected to be returned when the value of the href attribute is
dereferenced.  Note that the type attribute does not override the
actual media type returned with the representation.

Title.description:
Gets or sets the "title" attribute conveys human-readable information about the
link.  The content of the "title" attribute is Language-Sensitive.

List.description: Gets or sets collection of document properties.

BuiltIn.description:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether flag indicates whether the property is built-in or not.
If true the property is built-in, if false the property is custom.

Name.description: Gets or sets name of the document property.

Value.description: Gets or sets string value of the document property.

link.description: Gets or sets link to the document.

WordsApiLink.description: Provides information for the words api resource link.

Code.description: Gets or sets api error code.

BookmarksResponse.description: This response should be returned by the service when handling:  GET bookmarks.

Bookmarks.description: Gets or sets bookmarks which are contained in document.

BookmarkList.description: Gets or sets array of bookmarks.

Name.description: Gets or sets the name of the bookmark.

Text.description: Gets or sets the text enclosed in the bookmark.

BookmarkResponse.description: This response should be returned by the service when handling:  GET bookmarks/{bookmarkName}.

Name.description: Gets or sets the name of the bookmark.

Text.description: Gets or sets the text enclosed in the bookmark.

BordersResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET {nodeWithBorders}/borders.

List.description: Gets or sets collection of comments.

Border.description: Represents a border of an object.

BorderType.description: Gets or sets the border type.

Color.description: Gets or sets the border color.

DistanceFromText.description: Gets or sets distance of the border from text or from the page edge in points.

LineStyle.description: Gets or sets the border style.

LineWidth.description: Gets or sets the border width in points.

Shadow.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the border has a shadow.

Web.description: Gets or sets hTML string color representation.

Alpha.description: Gets or sets alpha component of color structure.

BorderResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET {nodeWithBorders}/borders.

ClassificationResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
PUT http://api.aspose.com/v4.0/words/classify.

BestClassName.description: Gets or sets best class name.

BestClassProbability.description: Gets or sets best class probability.

BestResults.description: Gets or sets array of best classes results.

ClassName.description: Gets or sets the name of the class.

ClassProbability.description: Gets or sets the probability of class.

CommentsResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v4.0/words/Test.doc/comments.

Comments.description: Gets or sets collection of comments.

CommentList.description: Gets or sets collection of comments.

Author.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the author name for a comment.

Content.description: Gets or sets content of comment.

DateTime.description: Gets or sets the date and time that the comment was made.

Initial.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the initials of the user associated with a specific comment.

RangeEnd.description: Gets or sets link to comment range end node.

RangeStart.description: Gets or sets link to comment range start node.

Text.description: Gets or sets this is a convenience property that allows to easily get or set text of the comment.

DocumentPosition.description: Represents a position in the document tree.

Node.description: Gets or sets link to  node.

Offset.description: Gets or sets offset into the node.

CommentResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v4.0/words/Test.doc/comments/0.

ComparingWithDocument.description: Gets or sets path to document to compare at the server.

Author.description: Gets or sets initials of the author to use for revisions.

DateTime.description: Gets or sets the date and time to use for revisions.

TiffSaveOptionsData.description: Container class for tiff save options.

ThresholdForFloydSteinbergDithering.description:
Gets or sets the threshold that determines the value of the binarization error in the Floyd-Steinberg method. when ImageBinarizationMethod is ImageBinarizationMethod.FloydSteinbergDithering.
Default value is 128.

TiffBinarizationMethod.description: Gets or sets specifies method used while converting images to 1 bpp format.

TiffCompression.description: Gets or sets type of compression.

ImageSaveOptionsData.description: Container abstract class for image save options.

GraphicsQualityOptions.description: Gets or sets allows to specify additional System.Drawing.Graphics quality options.

HorizontalResolution.description:
Gets or sets the horizontal resolution for the generated images, in dots per inch.

This property has effect only when saving to raster image formats.
The default value is 96.

ImageBrightness.description: Gets or sets brightness of image.

ImageColorMode.description: Gets or sets color mode of image.

ImageContrast.description: Gets or sets contrast of image.

PaperColor.description: Gets or sets background (paper) color of image.

PixelFormat.description: Gets or sets pixel format of image.

Resolution.description:
Gets or sets both horizontal and vertical resolution for the generated images, in dots per inch.

This property has effect only when saving to raster image formats.
The default value is 96.

Scale.description: Gets or sets zoom factor of image.

UseAntiAliasing.description: Gets or sets determine whether or not to use anti-aliasing for rendering.

If this flag is set redundant nested canvases and empty canvases are removed, also neighbor glyphs with the same formatting are concatenated.

If this value is not empty, all CSS classes generated by Aspose.Words will start with the specified prefix.This might be useful, for example, if you add custom CSS to generated documents and want to prevent class name conflicts.
If the value is not null or empty, it must be a valid CSS identifier.

Gets or sets controls how textboxes represented by Aspose.Words.Drawing.Shape are saved to HTML, MHTML or EPUB. Default value is false.

  When set to true, exports textboxes as inline "svg" elements. When false, exports as "image" elements.

ImageResolution.description: Gets or sets specifies the output resolution for images when exporting.

ImagesFolder.description: Gets or sets specifies the physical folder where images are saved when exporting a document.

ImagesFolderAlias.description: Gets or sets specifies the name of the folder used to construct image URIs.

MetafileFormat.description:
Gets or sets specifies in what format metafiles are saved when exporting to HTML, MHTML, or EPUB.
Default value is Aspose.Words.Saving.HtmlMetafileFormat.Png, meaning that metafiles are rendered to raster PNG images.

Metafiles are not natively displayed by HTML browsers. By default, Aspose.Words converts WMF and EMF images into PNG files when exporting to HTML.Other options are to convert metafiles to SVG images or to export them as is without conversion.
Some image transforms, in particular image cropping, will not be applied to metafile images if they are exported to HTML without conversion.

OfficeMathOutputMode.description: Gets or sets controls how OfficeMath objects are exported to HTML, MHTML or EPUB.  Default value is HtmlOfficeMathOutputMode.Image.

PrettyFormat.description: Gets or sets specifies whether or not use pretty formats output.

ResolveFontNames.description:
Gets or sets specifies whether font family names used in the document are resolved and substituted according to FontSettings when being written into HTML-based formats.
default value is false.

ScaleImageToShapeSize.description: Gets or sets specifies whether images are scaled by Aspose.Words to the bounding shape size when exporting.

TableWidthOutputMode.description: Gets or sets controls how table, row and cell widths are exported.

ExportFormFields.description: Gets or sets indication of whether form fields are exported as interactive items (as 'input' tag) rather than converted to text or graphics.

FontFormat.description: Gets or sets specifies export format of fonts.

Gets or sets specifies the margins around pages in an HTML document.

Open Office uses centimeters when specifying lengths, widths and other measurable formatting and content properties in documents whereas MS Office uses inches.

If resolution of an image in the document is less than threshold value,
the downsampling algorithm will not be applied.
A value of 0 means the threshold check is not used and all images that can be reduced in size are downsampled.

SetPageNumberOnFirstPage.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether if true the page number is added on first page too.

ParagraphLinkCollectionResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v4.0/words/Test.doc/paragraphs.

Paragraphs.description: Gets or sets collection of paragraphs.

ParagraphLinkList.description: Gets or sets collection of paragraph's links.

ParagraphResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v4.0/words/Test.doc/paragraphs/{0}.

ParagraphFormatResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v4.0/words/Test.doc/paragraphs/{0}/format.

ParagraphFormat.description: Gets or sets represents all the formatting for a paragraph.

AddSpaceBetweenFarEastAndAlpha.description:
Gets or sets a flag indicating whether inter-character spacing is automatically adjusted between regions
of Latin text and regions of East Asian text in the current paragraph.

AddSpaceBetweenFarEastAndDigit.description:
Gets or sets a flag indicating whether inter-character spacing is automatically adjusted between regions
of numbers and regions of East Asian text in the current paragraph.

Alignment.description: Gets or sets text alignment for the paragraph.

Bidi.description: Gets or sets whether this is a right-to-left paragraph.

DropCapPosition.description: Gets or sets the position for a drop cap text.

FirstLineIndent.description:
Gets or sets the value (in points) for a first line or hanging indent.
Use a positive value to set a first-line indent, and use a negative value to set a hanging indent.

IsListItem.description: Gets or sets True when the paragraph is an item in a bulleted or numbered list.

KeepTogether.description: Gets or sets true if all lines in the paragraph are to remain on the same page.

KeepWithNext.description: Gets or sets true if the paragraph is to remains on the same page as the paragraph that follows it.

LeftIndent.description: Gets or sets the value (in points) that represents the left indent for paragraph.

LineSpacing.description: Gets or sets the line spacing (in points) for the paragraph.

LineSpacingRule.description: Gets or sets the line spacing for the paragraph.

LinesToDrop.description: Gets or sets the number of lines of the paragraph text used to calculate the drop cap height.

NoSpaceBetweenParagraphsOfSameStyle.description:
Gets or sets when true,  and  will be ignored
between the paragraphs of the same style.

OutlineLevel.description: Gets or sets specifies the outline level of the paragraph in the document.

PageBreakBefore.description: Gets or sets true if a page break is forced before the paragraph.

RightIndent.description: Gets or sets the value (in points) that represents the right indent for paragraph.

SpaceAfter.description: Gets or sets the amount of spacing (in points) after the paragraph.

SpaceAfterAuto.description: Gets or sets true if the amount of spacing after the paragraph is set automatically.

SpaceBefore.description: Gets or sets the amount of spacing (in points) before the paragraph.

SpaceBeforeAuto.description: Gets or sets true if the amount of spacing before the paragraph is set automatically.

StyleIdentifier.description: Gets or sets the locale independent style identifier of the paragraph style applied to this formatting.

StyleName.description: Gets or sets the name of the paragraph style applied to this formatting.

SuppressAutoHyphens.description:
Gets or sets specifies whether the current paragraph should be exempted from any hyphenation which
is applied in the document settings.

SuppressLineNumbers.description:
Gets or sets specifies whether the current paragraph's lines should be exempted from line numbering
which is applied in the parent section.

WidowControl.description: Gets or sets true if the first and last lines in the paragraph are to remain on the same page as the rest of the paragraph.

ProtectionDataResponse.description: Response for the request of data about protection.

DocumentLink.description: Gets or sets link to the document.

ProtectionData.description: Gets or sets protection's data of the document.
Container for the data about protection of the document.

ProtectionType.description: Gets or sets type of the protection.
Gets or sets new type of protection.

RangeTextResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v4.0/words/Test.doc/range/{0}/{1}/.

Text.description: Gets or sets text from range.

DocumentName.description: Gets or sets name for new document.

TextType.description: Gets or sets range's text type.

ReplaceTextParameters.description: Class for document replace text request building.

OldValue.description: Gets or sets old text value (or regex pattern ) to replace.

NewValue.description: Gets or sets new text value to replace by.

IsMatchCase.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether flag, true means the search is case-sensitive; false means the search is not case-sensitive.

IsMatchWholeWord.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether flag, means that only whole word matched are replaced.

IsOldValueRegex.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether flag, means that  contains regex expression.

DocumentLink.description: Gets or sets link to the document.

Matches.description: Gets or sets number of occurrences of the captured text in the document.

RevisionsModificationResponse.description: response of the modification operations for the revisions collection (now these are acceptAll and rejectAll).

Result.description: Gets or sets result of the modification operations for the revisions collection.

ModificationOperationResult.description: result of the operation which modifies the original document and saves the result.

Source.description: Gets or sets link to the source document (source for the modification operation).

Dest.description: Gets or sets link to the dest document (result of the modification operation).

RunsResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v4.0/words/Test.doc/{paragraphPath}/runs.

Runs.description: Gets or sets collection of runs.
Represents DTO for collection of runs.

List.description: Gets or sets collection of fields.

RunResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v4.0/words/Test.doc/paragraphs/{0}/runs/{1}.

FontResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v4.0/words/Test.doc/paragraphs/{0}/runs/{1}/font.

AllCaps.description: Gets or sets true if the font is formatted as all capital letters.

Bidi.description: Gets or sets specifies whether the contents of this run shall have right-to-left characteristics.

Bold.description: Gets or sets true if the font is formatted as bold.

BoldBi.description: Gets or sets true if the right-to-left text is formatted as bold.

Border.description: Gets or sets border object that specifies border for the font.

Color.description: Gets or sets the color of the font.

ComplexScript.description:
Gets or sets specifies whether the contents of this run shall be treated as complex script text regardless
of their Unicode character values when determining the formatting for this run.

DoubleStrikeThrough.description: Gets or sets true if the font is formatted as double strikethrough text.

Emboss.description: Gets or sets true if the font is formatted as embossed.

Engrave.description: Gets or sets true if the font is formatted as engraved.

Hidden.description: Gets or sets true if the font is formatted as hidden text.

HighlightColor.description: Gets or sets the highlight (marker) color.

Italic.description: Gets or sets true if the font is formatted as italic.

ItalicBi.description: Gets or sets true if the right-to-left text is formatted as italic.

Kerning.description: Gets or sets the font size at which kerning starts.

LocaleId.description: Gets or sets the locale identifier (language) of the formatted characters.

LocaleIdBi.description: Gets or sets the locale identifier (language) of the formatted right-to-left characters.

LocaleIdFarEast.description: Gets or sets the locale identifier (language) of the formatted Asian characters.

Name.description: Gets or sets the name of the font.

NameAscii.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the font used for Latin text (characters with character codes from 0 (zero) through 127).

NameBi.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the name of the font in a right-to-left language document.

NameFarEast.description: Gets or sets returns or sets an East Asian font name.

NameOther.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the font used for characters with character codes from 128 through 255.

NoProofing.description: Gets or sets true when the formatted characters are not to be spell checked.

Outline.description: Gets or sets true if the font is formatted as outline.

Position.description:
Gets or sets the position of text (in points) relative to the base line.
A positive number raises the text, and a negative number lowers it.

Scaling.description: Gets or sets character width scaling in percent.

Shadow.description: Gets or sets true if the font is formatted as shadowed.

Size.description: Gets or sets the font size in points.

SizeBi.description: Gets or sets the font size in points used in a right-to-left document.

SmallCaps.description: Gets or sets true if the font is formatted as small capital letters.

Spacing.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the spacing (in points) between characters.

StrikeThrough.description: Gets or sets true if the font is formatted as strikethrough text.

StyleIdentifier.description: Gets or sets the locale independent style identifier of the character style applied to this formatting.

StyleName.description: Gets or sets the name of the character style applied to this formatting.

Subscript.description: Gets or sets true if the font is formatted as subscript.

Superscript.description: Gets or sets true if the font is formatted as superscript.

TextEffect.description: Gets or sets the font animation effect.

Underline.description: Gets or sets the type of underline applied to the font.

UnderlineColor.description: Gets or sets the color of the underline applied to the font.

SearchResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v4.0/words/Test.doc/search.

SearchingPattern.description: Gets or sets a regular expression pattern used to find matches.

SearchResults.description: Gets or sets collection of search results.

ResultsList.description: Gets or sets collection of comments.

RangeStart.description: Gets or sets link to result range start node.

RangeEnd.description: Gets or sets link to result range end node.

SectionLinkCollectionResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v4.0/words/Test.doc/sections.

Sections.description: Gets or sets collection of sections.

SectionLinkList.description: Gets or sets collection of section's links.

SectionResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v4.0/words/Test.doc/sections/{0}.

HeaderFooters.description: Gets or sets link to HeaderFooters resource.

PageSetup.description: Gets or sets link to PageSetup resource.

Paragraphs.description: Gets or sets link to Paragraphs resource.

Tables.description: Gets or sets link to Tables resource.

SectionPageSetupResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v4.0/words/Test.doc/sections/{0}/PageSetup.

PageSetup.description: Represents the page setup properties of a section.

Bidi.description: Gets or sets specifies that this section contains bidirectional (complex scripts) text.

BorderAlwaysInFront.description: Gets or sets specifies where the page border is positioned relative to intersecting texts and objects.

BorderAppliesTo.description: Gets or sets specifies which pages the page border is printed on.

BorderDistanceFrom.description:
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the specified page border is measured from the edge of the page or from
the text it surrounds.

BottomMargin.description:
Gets or sets returns or sets the distance (in points) between the bottom edge of the page and the bottom boundary of the body
text.

DifferentFirstPageHeaderFooter.description: Gets or sets true if a different header or footer is used on the first page.

FirstPageTray.description:
Gets or sets the paper tray (bin) to use for the first page of a section.
The value is implementation (printer) specific.

FooterDistance.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the distance (in points) between the footer and the bottom of the page.

Gutter.description: Gets or sets the amount of extra space added to the margin for document binding.

HeaderDistance.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the distance (in points) between the header and the top of the page.

LeftMargin.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the distance (in points) between the left edge of the page and the left boundary of the body text.

LineNumberCountBy.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the numeric increment for line numbers.

LineNumberDistanceFromText.description: Gets or sets distance between the right edge of line numbers and the left edge of the document.

LineNumberRestartMode.description:
Gets or sets the way line numbering runs  that is, whether it starts over at the beginning of a new
page or section or runs continuously.

LineStartingNumber.description: Gets or sets the starting line number.

Orientation.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the orientation of the page.

OtherPagesTray.description:
Gets or sets the paper tray (bin) to be used for all but the first page of a section.
The value is implementation (printer) specific.

PageHeight.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the height of the page in points.

PageNumberStyle.description: Gets or sets the page number format.

PageStartingNumber.description: Gets or sets the starting page number of the section.

PageWidth.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the width of the page in points.

PaperSize.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the paper size.

RestartPageNumbering.description: Gets or sets true if page numbering restarts at the beginning of the section.

RightMargin.description:
Gets or sets returns or sets the distance (in points) between the right edge of the page and the right boundary of the body
text.

RtlGutter.description:
Gets or sets whether Microsoft Word uses gutters for the section based on a right-to-left language or a
left-to-right language.

SectionStart.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the type of section break for the specified object.

SuppressEndnotes.description:
Gets or sets true if endnotes are printed at the end of the next section that doesn't suppress endnotes.
                Suppressed endnotes are printed before the endnotes in that section.

TopMargin.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the distance (in points) between the top edge of the page and the top boundary of the body text.

VerticalAlignment.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the vertical alignment of text on each page in a document or section.

SplitDocumentResponse.description: This response should be returned by the service when handling:  POST /{name}/split .

SplitResult.description: Gets or sets resylt of splitting document.

SourceDocument.description: Gets or sets linkt to the source document.

Pages.description: Gets or sets array of pages.

ZippedPages.description: Gets or sets link to the file archive with pages.

StatDataResponse.description: Response for the request of the document's statistical data.

DocumentLink.description: Gets or sets link to the document.

StatData.description: Gets or sets statistical data of the document.

DocumentStatData.description: Container for the document's statistical data.

WordCount.description: Gets or sets total count of words in the document.

ParagraphCount.description: Gets or sets total count of paragraphs in the document.

PageCount.description: Gets or sets total count of pages in the document.

FootnotesStatData.description: Gets or sets detailed statistics of footnotes.

PageStatData.description: Gets or sets detailed statistics of all pages.

FootnotesStatData.description: Container for the footnotes statistical data.

WordCount.description: Gets or sets total count of words in footnotes.

ParagraphCount.description: Gets or sets total count of paragraphs in footnotes.

PageStatData.description: Container for the page's statistical data.

WordCount.description: Gets or sets total count of words in the page.

ParagraphCount.description: Gets or sets total count of paragraphs in the page.

FootnotesStatData.description: Gets or sets detailed statistics of footnotes.

TableLinkCollectionResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v4.0/words/Test.doc/tables.

Tables.description: Gets or sets collection of tables.

TableLinkList.description: Gets or sets collection of table's links.

Position.description: Gets or sets table will be inserted before specified position.

ColumnsCount.description: Gets or sets count of columns. Default is 2.

RowsCount.description: Gets or sets count of rows. Default is 2.

TableResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v4.0/words/Test.doc/tables/{0}.

TableRowList.description: Gets or sets collection of table's rows.

RowFormat.description: Gets or sets provides access to the formatting properties of the row.

TableCellList.description: Gets or sets collection of table's rows.

TableRowFormat.description: Represents all formatting for a table row.

AllowBreakAcrossPages.description: Gets or sets true if the text in a table row is allowed to split across a page break.

HeadingFormat.description: Gets or sets true if the row is repeated as a table heading on every page when the table spans more than one page.

Height.description: Gets or sets the height of the table row in points.

HeightRule.description: Gets or sets the rule for determining the height of the table row.

Alignment.description: Gets or sets specifies how an inline table is aligned in the document.

AllowAutoFit.description: Gets or sets allows Microsoft Word and Aspose.Words to automatically resize cells in a table to fit their contents.

Bidi.description: Gets or sets whether this is a right-to-left table.

BottomPadding.description: Gets or sets the amount of space (in points) to add below the contents of cells.

CellSpacing.description: Gets or sets the amount of space (in points) between the cells.

LeftIndent.description: Gets or sets the value that represents the left indent of the table.

LeftPadding.description: Gets or sets the amount of space (in points) to add to the left of the contents of cells.

PreferredWidth.description:
Gets or sets the table preferred width.
Preferred width can be specified as a percentage, number of points or a special "auto" value.

RightPadding.description: Gets or sets the amount of space (in points) to add to the right of the contents of cells.

StyleIdentifier.description: Gets or sets the locale independent style identifier of the table style applied to this table.

StyleName.description: Gets or sets the name of the table style applied to this table.

StyleOptions.description: Gets or sets bit flags that specify how a table style is applied to this table.

TextWrapping.description: Gets or sets get or sets TextWrapping  for table.

TopPadding.description: Gets or sets the amount of space (in points) to add above the contents of cells.

Type.description: Gets or sets the unit of measure used for this preferred width value.

Value.description: Gets or sets the preferred width value. The unit of measure is specified in the  property.

TablePropertiesResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v4.0/words/Test.doc/tables/{0}/properties.

TableRowResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v4.0/words/Test.doc/tables/{0}.

InsertAfter.description: Gets or sets table row will be inserted after row with specified 0-based index.

ColumnsCount.description: Gets or sets count of columns. Default is 1.

TableRowFormatResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v4.0/words/Test.doc/tables/{0}/rows/{1}/rowformat.

TableCellResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v4.0/words/Test.doc/tables/{0}.

InsertAfter.description: Gets or sets table cell will be inserted after cell with specified 0-based index.

TableCellFormatResponse.description:
This response should be returned by the service when handling:
GET http://api.aspose.com/v4.0/words/Test.doc/tables/{0}/rows/{1}/cells/{2}/cellformat.

TableCellFormat.description: Represents all formatting for a table row.

BottomPadding.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the amount of space (in points) to add below the contents of cell.

FitText.description: Gets or sets if true, fits text in the cell, compressing each paragraph to the width of the cell.

HorizontalMerge.description: Gets or sets specifies how the cell is merged horizontally with other cells in the row.

LeftPadding.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the amount of space (in points) to add to the left of the contents of cell.

Orientation.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the orientation of text in a table cell.

PreferredWidth.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the preferred width of the cell.

RightPadding.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the amount of space (in points) to add to the right of the contents of cell.

TopPadding.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the amount of space (in points) to add above the contents of cell.

VerticalAlignment.description: Gets or sets returns or sets the vertical alignment of text in the cell.

VerticalMerge.description: Gets or sets specifies how the cell is merged with other cells vertically.

Width.description: Gets or sets the width of the cell in points.

WrapText.description: Gets or sets if true, wrap text for the cell.

WatermarkText.description: Class for insert watermark text request building.

Text.description: Gets or sets the watermark text.

RotationAngle.description: Gets or sets the watermark rotation angle.

LoadWebDocumentData.description: Contains data for load web document.

LoadingDocumentUrl.description: Gets or sets web document url.
